your-trusted-partner-in-drone-backpacks-: Your trusted partner in drone backpacks. We proudly present ourselves as a manufacturer that not only creates, but also brings to life ideas and innovations for those who are diving into the world of drones.
our-mission-is-not-just-to-sell-backpack: Our mission is not just to sell backpacks, but also to create high-quality and functional products that meet all the needs and requirements of modern drone pilots. We believe in combining style, comfort, and reliability in every piece that leaves our production facilities. production facilities.
dronetorba-is-not-just-a-brand-name-it-i: DroneTorba is not just a brand name, it is a creative space where ideas are born and dreams come true. We dont resell, we design and sew our own products, putting our love of aviation and desire to give our customers something special into each design.

1-1-this-offer-is-an-official-offer-of-t: 1.1. This offer is an official offer of TM "DроноТорба", hereinafter referred to as the "Seller", to conclude a contract for the sale of goods remotely, that is, through the online store, hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement", and places the Public Offer (offer) on the official website of the Seller https://dronotorba.com (hereinafter referred to as the "Website").
1-2-the-moment-of-full-and-unconditional: 1.2. The moment of full and unconditional acceptance by the Buyer of the Seller's offer (acceptance) to conclude an electronic contract for the sale of goods is considered the fact that the Buyer has paid for the order under the terms of this Agreement, within the terms and at the prices indicated on the Seller's Website.
2-1-in-this-offer-unless-the-context-req: 2.1. In this offer, unless the context requires otherwise, the following terms have the following meanings:
product-models-accessories-components-an: - "Product" - models, accessories, components and related items;
online-store-in-accordance-with-the-law-: - "Online store" - in accordance with the Law of Ukraine "On Electronic Commerce", a means for the presentation or sale of goods, works or services by means of an electronic transaction.
seller-a-company-that-sells-goods-presen: - Seller - a company that sells goods presented on the Website.
buyer-an-individual-who-has-entered-into: - "Buyer" - an individual who has entered into an Agreement with the Seller on the terms set forth below.
order-the-selection-of-individual-items-: - "Order" - the selection of individual items from the list of goods specified by the Buyer when placing an order and making payment.
3-1-the-seller-undertakes-to-transfer-th: 3.1. The Seller undertakes to transfer the Goods to the Buyer's ownership, and the Buyer undertakes to pay for and accept the Goods under the terms of this Agreement. This Agreement governs the sale and purchase of goods in the online store, including:
voluntary-selection-of-goods-by-the-buye: - voluntary selection of goods by the Buyer in the online store;
independent-ordering-by-the-buyer-in-the: - independent ordering by the Buyer in the Online Store;
payment-by-the-buyer-for-the-order-place: - payment by the Buyer for the order placed in the Online Store;
processing-and-delivery-of-the-order-to-: - processing and delivery of the order to the Buyer in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
4-1-the-buyer-has-the-right-to-place-an-: 4.1 The Buyer has the right to place an order for any product presented on the Website of the Online Store and available.
4-2-each-item-can-be-presented-in-the-or: 4.2. Each item can be presented in the order in any quantity.
4-3-in-the-absence-of-goods-in-the-wareh: 4.3. In the absence of goods in the warehouse, the Company Manager is obliged to notify the Buyer (by phone or e-mail).
4-4-in-the-absence-of-goods-the-buyer-ha: 4.4. In the absence of goods, the Buyer has the right to replace it with goods of a similar model, refuse this product, cancel the order.
5-1-payment-is-made-according-to-the-inv: 5.1. Payment is made according to the invoice.
5-2-if-the-funds-are-not-received-the-on: 5.2. If the funds are not received, the Online Store reserves the right to cancel the order.
terms-of-delivery-of-the-order: Terms of delivery of the order
6-1-delivery-of-goods-purchased-in-the-o: 6.1. Delivery of goods purchased in the Online Store is carried out by means of transport companies.
6-2-together-with-the-order-the-buyer-is: 6.2. Together with the order, the Buyer is provided with documents in accordance with the legislation of Ukraine.
rights-and-obligations-of-the-parties: Rights and obligations of the parties
7-1-the-seller-has-the-right-to: 7.1. The Seller has the right to:
unilaterally-terminate-the-provision-of-: - unilaterally terminate the provision of services under this Agreement in case of violation by the Buyer of the terms of this Agreement.
timely-pay-and-receive-the-order-on-the-: - timely pay and receive the order on the terms of this agreement.
place-an-order-in-the-online-store: - place an order in the online store;
require-the-seller-to-fulfill-the-terms-: - require the Seller to fulfill the terms of this Agreement.
8-1-the-parties-shall-be-liable-for-non-: 8.1. The Parties shall be liable for non-fulfillment or improper fulfillment of the terms of this Agreement in the manner prescribed by this Agreement and the current legislation of Ukraine.
8-2-the-seller-is-not-responsible-for: 8.2. The Seller is not responsible for:
the-appearance-of-the-goods-changed-by-t: - the appearance of the Goods changed by;
for-a-slight-discrepancy-in-the-color-sc: - for a slight discrepancy in the color scheme of the Goods, which may differ from the original Goods solely due to the different color rendering of personal computer monitors of certain models;
for-the-content-and-accuracy-of-the-info: - for the content and accuracy of the information provided by the Buyer when placing an order;
for-delays-and-interruptions-in-the-prov: - for delays and interruptions in the provision of Services (order processing and delivery of goods) that occur for reasons beyond its control;
for-unlawful-illegal-actions-performed-b: - for unlawful illegal actions performed by the Buyer using this access to the Internet.
8-3-the-buyer-using-the-internet-access-: 8.3. The Buyer, using the Internet access provided to him, is solely responsible for the damage caused by his actions to persons or their property, legal entities, the state or moral principles of morality.
8-4-in-the-event-of-force-majeure-the-pa: 8.4. In the event of force majeure, the parties shall be released from fulfillment of the terms of this Agreement. For the purposes of this Agreement, force majeure circumstances shall mean events of an extraordinary, unforeseen nature that exclude or objectively interfere with the performance of this Agreement, the occurrence of which the Parties could not have foreseen and prevented by reasonable means.
8-5-the-parties-shall-use-their-best-eff: 8.5. The Parties shall use their best efforts to resolve any disagreements exclusively through negotiations.
9-1-the-online-store-reserves-the-right-: 9.1. The Online Store reserves the right to unilaterally amend this Agreement subject to its prior publication on the website https://dronotorba.com
9-2-the-online-store-is-designed-to-orga: 9.2. The online store is designed to organize a remote method of selling goods via the Internet.
9-3-the-buyer-is-responsible-for-the-acc: 9.3. The buyer is responsible for the accuracy of the information specified when placing an order. At the same time, when making an acceptance (placing an order and subsequent payment for the goods), the Buyer gives the Seller his unconditional consent to the collection, processing, storage, use of his personal data, within the meaning of the Law of Ukraine "On Personal Data Protection".
9-4-payment-by-the-buyer-for-the-order-p: 9.4. Payment by the Buyer for the order placed in the online store means the Buyer's full consent to the terms of the purchase and sale agreement (public offer).
9-5-the-actual-date-of-the-electronic-ag: 9.5. The actual date of the electronic agreement between the parties is the date of acceptance of the terms and conditions, in accordance with Art. 11 of the Law of Ukraine "On Electronic Commerce".
9-6-using-the-resource-of-the-online-sto: 9.6. Using the resource of the online store for previewing the goods, as well as for placing an order for the Buyer is free of charge.
9-7-the-information-provided-by-the-buye: 9.7. The information provided by the Buyer is confidential. The Online Store uses information about the Buyer solely for the purpose of processing the order, sending notifications to the Buyer, delivering the goods, making settlements, etc.
the-procedure-for-returning-products-of-: The procedure for returning products of good quality
10-1-the-return-of-goods-to-the-online-s: 10.1. The return of goods to the Online Store is carried out in accordance with the current legislation of Ukraine.
10-2-return-of-the-goods-to-the-online-s: 10.2. Return of the goods to the Online Store is made at the expense of the Buyer.
10-3-when-the-buyer-returns-the-goods-of: 10.3. When the Buyer returns the goods of good quality, the Online Store shall refund the amount paid for the goods upon return of the goods, less compensation for the costs of the Online Store related to the delivery of the goods to the Buyer.
11-1-an-electronic-agreement-shall-be-de: 11.1 An electronic agreement shall be deemed concluded from the moment the person who sent the proposal to conclude such an agreement receives a response on acceptance of this proposal in accordance with the procedure established by part six of Article 11 of the Law of Ukraine "On Electronic Commerce".
11-2-before-the-expiration-of-the-term-t: 11.2. Before the expiration of the term, this Agreement may be terminated by mutual agreement of the parties until the actual delivery of the goods, by refund.
11-3-the-parties-have-the-right-to-termi: 11.3. The Parties have the right to terminate this Agreement unilaterally, in case of non-fulfillment by one of the parties of the terms of this Agreement and in cases provided for by the current legislation of Ukraine.

dronotorba-products-are-covered-by-a-war: DronoTorba products are covered by a warranty that confirms the obligation to ensure that the product is free from factory defects. The warranty is provided for a period of 14 calendar days from the date of purchase in our online store, provided that the product has not been used.
pay-special-attention-to-checking-the-co: Pay special attention to checking the completeness and absence of defects in the product upon receipt at the offices of courier delivery services!
you-can-replace-or-return-the-product-wi: You can replace or return the product within 14 days after purchase in accordance with the "Consumer Protection Act".
the-return-procedure-is-carried-out-by-t: The return procedure is carried out by the buyer returning the product purchased in the DronoTorba online store, followed by a refund to the buyer.
returns-are-possible-only-in-the-followi: Returns are possible only in the following cases:
if-there-are-no-signs-of-use-or-wear-of-: - if there are no signs of use or wear of the product - scratches, snags, scuffs, tears, etc;
the-original-dronotorba-labels-are-still: - the original DronoTorba labels are still intact;
if-the-integrity-of-the-package-is-not-c: - if the integrity of the package is not compromised;
if-the-selected-backpack-does-not-fit-yo: - if the selected backpack does not fit you, we will exchange it, provided that the backpack was only tried on and retained its original appearance.
you-can-get-more-detailed-information-on: You can get more detailed information on the replacement or return of product by contacting us by phone or e-mail. In this case, you must specify:
the-reason-for-the-return-or-exchange: - the reason for the return or exchange;
in-case-of-return-details-for-transferri: - in case of return - details for transferring funds;
in-case-of-exchange-the-product-for-whic: - in case of exchange - the product for which you want to exchange the previously purchased product.
replacement-or-return-of-product-is-carr: Replacement or return of product is carried out using the courier service that you used when ordering.
if-the-product-is-returned-due-to-a-fact: If the product is returned due to a factory defect, all transportation costs are paid by our company (in this case, when sending, indicate in the declaration that the recipient paid for the parcel).
dronotorb-products-are-available-in-any-: DronoTorba products are available in any country in the world. We can make international delivery all over the world. To do this, just place an order on the website and specify the address for delivery!
you-can-pay-for-your-order-with-a-credit: You can pay for your order with a credit card. After placing the order, our manager will check the availability of the product in the warehouse and contact you to clarify the details and send you the payment information.
the-order-will-be-packed-and-shipped-aft: The order will be packed and shipped after receiving the payment within 1-2 business days.
if-you-have-any-questions-about-your-ord: If you have any questions about your order, please contact us:
pickup-from-our-production-hall-at-the-a: - Pickup from our production hall at the address: Kyiv.
nova-poshta-mist-express-delivery-to-the: - Nova Poshta, Mist-Express. Delivery to the post office. Orders are sent after 100% payment for the product.
transfer-to-the-bank-account-according-t: - Transfer to the bank account according to the banking details.
by-using-our-sites-you-confirm-that-you-: By using our sites, you confirm that you accept these terms of use and that you agree to comply with them. If you do not agree to these terms, you must not use our sites.
we-amend-these-terms-from-time-to-time-t: We amend these terms from time to time. The amended terms will be posted on this site, and will become effective from the date they are posted. Your continued use of the site after any such post will constitute your acceptance of, and agreement to, any changes.
we-may-amend-and-change-our-sites-from-t: We may amend and change our site from time to time.

after-placing-an-order-our-manager-will-: After placing an order, our manager will check the availability of the products in the warehouse and contact you to clarify the details and send payment information.

the-cost-of-delivery-is-calculated-based: The cost of delivery is calculated based on the carrier's tariffs and depends on the dimensions of the selected product, weight, and region of delivery.

this-service-will-help-you-to-find-out-w: This service will help you to find out where your shipment is now. Write the express waybill number and get information about the shipment.
please-note-that-the-tracking-of-the-par: Please note that the tracking of the parcel will be available after the order passes customs control, which is why the tracking number does not work for the first few days after the order is shipped from the international warehouse.
when-delivering-an-online-order-to-a-car: When delivering an online order to a carrier's office, the cargo storage period is 5 days.

the-purpose-of-this-privacy-policy-is-to: The purpose of this Privacy Policy is to inform you about how DronoTorba ("DronoTorba", "we", "us") processes your personal data and your rights in this regard.
we-process-the-following-personal-data: We process the following personal data:
the-processing-is-necessary-for-the-perf: The processing is necessary for the performance of our agreement with you regarding online purchases on the website https://dronotorba.com - (Article 11(1)(3) of the Law of Ukraine "On Personal Data Protection").
our-legitimate-interest-in-processing-th: Our legitimate interest in processing the purchase (Section 11(1)(6) of the Personal Data Protection Act).
pursuant-to-part-3-of-article-29-of-the-: Pursuant to Part 3 of Article 29 of the Law of Ukraine "On Personal Data Protection", the member states of the European Economic Area, as well as the states that have signed the Council of Europe Convention for the Protection of Individuals with regard to Automatic Processing of Personal Data, are recognized as ensuring an adequate level of personal data protection.
by-providing-us-with-your-personal-data-: By providing us with your personal data, you consent to the transfer of your personal data as set forth in this section and do not require notification of such transfer. Otherwise, you should stop using the website https://dronotba.com/ and not provide us with your personal data.
backups-containing-your-personal-data-wi: Backups containing your personal data will be deleted in a standardized manner through gradual overwriting and cannot be accessed in the usual way.
this-privacy-policy-may-be-updated-and-m: This Privacy Policy may be updated and modified, for example, due to changes in data protection laws and practices. We recommend that you stay informed of any changes to the Privacy Policy.
